title: Black Screen 2 qs in a row....
body: about to get a 30 minute ban most likely for nothing, Please fix this...

replies.body: Assuming this happens when you accept a match and try to get into champ select but only see a black screen, this issue should be fixed now. If this ever happens again, enabling Low Spec mode from the client settings (top right cog wheel) is a good workaround.
